title: Bitdefender Named a Representative Vendor in the 2025 Gartner® Market Guide for Managed Detection and Response
description: Bitdefender has once again been recognized as a Representative Vendor in the Gartner® Market Guide for Managed Detection and Response (MDR) — marking the fourth consecutive year of inclusion. According to Gartner, more than 600 providers globally claim to deliver MDR services, yet only a select few meet the criteria to appear in the Market Guide.
